tool_description: Manages object classes and categories for annotation projects, including class creation, validation, and hierarchical organization.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the annotation project

class_names.description: List of object class names to manage

class_colors.description: Hex color codes for each class (e.g., #FF0000)

parent_classes.description: Parent class names for hierarchical organization

error_messages: Invalid project_id: Project identifier must be a non-empty string. Provide a valid project ID.
Empty class_names: At least one class name is required. Add class names to the array.
Duplicate class names: Class names must be unique within the project. Remove duplicates from class_names.
Invalid color format: Colors must be valid hex codes (e.g., #FF0000). Check class_colors format.
Array length mismatch: class_colors, parent_classes, and class_descriptions arrays must match class_names length or be empty.
usage: Provide project_id and class_names array with your object classes. Optionally add class_colors, parent_classes, and class_descriptions for enhanced organization. Returns structured class configuration.

hierarchy_levels.description: Number of hierarchical levels in class structure

validation_status.description: Overall validation status of class configuration
